name: Code:Saviour
description:
Code:Saviour is a First-Person Shooter game developed by Fallen Star Studio, a group of students from UOWKDU Malaysia under the Bachelor of Game Development course. This is also an FYP project for the students.

Code:Saviour is a game where the player acts as a solider and attempts to complete the objectives in the game. The player will also encounter enemies  in-game that will stop the player from completing their objectives. Players have to find a way to complete the objectives using their own decision-making skills.

The team that developed Code:Saviour is Fallen Star Studio.
